Name: Scary Husband HD: Anime Horror Game
About the game: You wake up in your house but there is a man here. He said he is your new husband and you are the wife. But you don't have a memories about your marriage with him. Is it some kind of prank? At first, it doesn't concern you because he is a handsome man like some anime husbando boys. But something is very creepy about him, say hello to your new scary husband! This game is a spin off of Scary Wife HD while you will be the wife instead. Here you can simulate if you ever have a very scary husband. Every time you meet your husband, she will get mad at you. And also you'll need to find at least 10 diary on old mansion about yourself because you have lost memory. You can also choose your husband appearance. Is it handsome, cute anime boy, sexy bodybuilder, hot teacher, big brother type or even old sugar daddy. Escape from the horror mansion and have your way of escape on Scary Husband HD! FEATURES: - Intense scary hide and seek gameplay. - Huge mansion to explore and full of secrets. - Choose your anime style playful and cute husbando. - More gameplay, places and characters in this HD version!
